ResearchProjectDef.Name: WVC_NodeTechs_Base
ResearchProjectDef.description: Studying a complex node system of mechanoid intelligence in order to recreate archotech technologies.

ResearchProjectDef.label: node researching SX
ResearchProjectDef.description: Studying a complex node system of mechanoid intelligence in order to recreate archotech technologies.\n\nThe study of this node will allow the creation of complex manipulators that will be the first step in replicating archotech technologies.

ResearchProjectDef.label: node researching HJ
ResearchProjectDef.description: Studying a complex node system of mechanoid intelligence in order to recreate archotech technologies.\n\nThe study of this node will allow you to create defensive systems similar to the archotech.

ResearchProjectDef.label: node researching CV
ResearchProjectDef.description: Studying a complex node system of mechanoid intelligence in order to recreate archotech technologies.\n\nThe study of this node will allow a more accurate understanding of life, whether organic or mechanical.

ResearchProjectDef.label: node researching GB
ResearchProjectDef.description: Studying a complex node system of mechanoid intelligence in order to recreate archotech technologies.\n\nThe study of this node will allow us to expand our knowledge of organic manipulation and bring us closer to the knowledge of immortality.

ResearchProjectDef.label: node researching WR
ResearchProjectDef.description: Studying a complex node system of mechanoid intelligence in order to recreate archotech technologies.\n\nThe study of this node will allow us to better understand the principles of thinking beings with gestalt consciousness.
